name: Shortcuts
description: Perform common tasks with your keyboard.
author: Mathieu Ablasou <taupiqueur.kanto@gmail.com>

002.goBack.description: Navigation · Go back to the previous page in tab’s history

003.goForward.description: Navigation · Go forward to the next page in tab’s history

005.reloadTabWithoutCache.description: Navigation · Reload selected tabs, ignoring cached content

006.goToNextPage.description: Navigation · Go to the next page in the series

007.goToPreviousPage.description: Navigation · Go to the previous page in the series

009.goUp.description: Navigation · Go up in the URL hierarchy

010.goToRoot.description: Navigation · Go to the root URL

014.copyURL.description: Clipboard · Copy URL of selected tabs

015.copyTitle.description: Clipboard · Copy title of selected tabs

016.copyTitleAndURL.description: Clipboard · Copy title and URL of selected tabs

017.openWebSearchForSelectedText.description: Web search · Perform a web search for selected text

026.scrollToTop.description: Scroll · Scroll to the top of the page

027.scrollToBottom.description: Scroll · Scroll to the bottom of the page

031.toggleFullScreen.description: Zoom · Turn full-screen mode on or off

032.openNewTab.description: Create tabs · Open and activate a new tab

033.openNewTabRight.description: Create tabs · Open and activate a new tab to the right

034.openNewWindow.description: Create tabs · Open a new window

035.openNewIncognitoWindow.description: Create tabs · Open a new window in Incognito mode

037.closeWindow.description: Close tabs · Close the window that contains the tab

038.restoreTab.description: Close tabs · Reopen previously closed tabs

040.togglePinTab.description: Tab state · Pin or unpin selected tabs

041.toggleGroupTab.description: Tab state · Group or ungroup selected tabs

042.toggleCollapseTabGroups.description: Tab state · Collapse or uncollapse tab groups

043.toggleMuteTab.description: Tab state · Mute or unmute selected tabs

045.sortTabsByURL.description: Organize tabs · Sort selected tabs by URL

046.groupTabsByDomain.description: Organize tabs · Group selected tabs by domain

047.renameTabGroup.description: Manage tab groups · Rename tab group

048.cycleTabGroupColorForward.description: Manage tab groups · Cycle forward through tab group colors

049.cycleTabGroupColorBackward.description: Manage tab groups · Cycle backward through tab group colors

050.activateAudibleTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the first audible tab

051.activateNextTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the next open tab

052.activatePreviousTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the previous open tab

053.activateFirstTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the leftmost open tab

054.activateSecondTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the second leftmost open tab

055.activateThirdTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the third leftmost open tab

056.activateFourthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the fourth leftmost open tab

057.activateFifthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the fifth leftmost open tab

058.activateSixthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the sixth leftmost open tab

059.activateSeventhTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the seventh leftmost open tab

060.activateEighthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the eighth leftmost open tab

061.activateLastTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the rightmost open tab

062.activateLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the last active tab

063.activateSecondLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the second last active tab

064.activateThirdLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the third last active tab

065.activateFourthLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the fourth last active tab

066.activateFifthLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the fifth last active tab

067.activateSixthLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the sixth last active tab

068.activateSeventhLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the seventh last active tab

069.activateEighthLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the eighth last active tab

070.activateNinthLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the ninth last active tab

071.activateNextWindow.description: Switch tabs · Activate the next open window

072.activatePreviousWindow.description: Switch tabs · Activate the previous open window

074.moveTabLeft.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs left

075.moveTabRight.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs right

076.moveTabFirst.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to the far left

077.moveTabLast.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to the far right

078.moveTabNewWindow.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to a new window

079.moveTabPreviousWindow.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to the previous open window

080.selectActiveTab.description: Select tabs · Deselect all other tabs

081.selectPreviousTab.description: Select tabs · Select the previous tab

082.selectNextTab.description: Select tabs · Select the next tab

084.selectTabsInGroup.description: Select tabs · Select tabs in group

086.selectRightTabs.description: Select tabs · Select tabs to the right

087.moveTabSelectionFaceBackward.description: Select tabs · Move tab selection’s face backward

088.moveTabSelectionFaceForward.description: Select tabs · Move tab selection’s face forward

089.bookmarkTab.description: Bookmarks · Save selected tabs as bookmarks

090.bookmarkSession.description: Bookmarks · Save the current session as bookmarks

091.addTabToReadingList.description: Reading list · Add selected tabs to your reading list

098.openSearchEnginesPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the “Search engines” page

100.openExtensionShortcutsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the “Extensions > Keyboard shortcuts” page
